patterns: What are side effects of Nimesulide?
i have pain in my back
responses: Nimesulide, a pain medication, may cause side effects such as nausea, vomiting, diarrhea, stomach or intestinal ulcers, skin redness, and allergic reactions like difficulty breathing, facial and lip swelling, and watery eyes. It can also elevate liver enzymes. If you experience any of these side effects, it is important to seek medical assistance.
